title: Christchurch terrorist discussed attacks online a year before carrying them out, new research reveals
transTitle: 新研究显示，克赖斯特彻奇恐怖分子在实施袭击前一年曾在网上讨论过袭击事件

title: Labour’s Ginny Andersen claims Police Minister was ‘paid to kill people’ while working in private security overseas
transTitle: 工党议员金妮·安德森 (Ginny Andersen) 声称警察部长在海外私人保安部门工作时“拿钱杀人”

title: Green Party MP Efeso Collins collapses during charity run
transTitle: 绿党议员埃菲索·柯林斯在慈善跑中倒下

title: Kura Reo courses sell out in minutes as demand grows
transTitle: 随着需求的增长，Kura Reo 课程在几分钟内就售罄
